segments.text: That overflowing sink is disgusting; water everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's drying a plate while standing in filth.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle is gross, soaking her shoes probably.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Kids climbing for cookies in this mess? Yuck.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool's unstable on that wet floorâ€”nasty setup.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy's hand in the jar, who knows if it's clean.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl reaching up, feet near the slop.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Cabinets dripping water; everything's getting ruined.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This kitchen hygiene is appalling right now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden looks tidy, but inside it's revolting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Sneaking cookies amid this chaos is just wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't look at that faucet spewing water anymore.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a sloppy, careless scene this has become.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her apron's probably getting splashed too.
segments.speaker: PAR
